texts.textentryhtml: Possibly Walter Hugelshorfer, Zurich (1899–1987); Dr. Rudolf J. and Lore Heinemann, New York; Dr. Edward H. Leiter.;

caption:
Giovanni Battista Tiepolo (1696–1770; born Venice, Italy; died Madrid, Spain), Bearded Oriental Man, Wearing Flat Cap and Cloak, 1730s. Pen and brown ink and brush and brown wash on cream laid paper; 18.1 x 9.9 cm. Gift of Dr. Edward Leiter, Class of 1964, in memory of Rudolf and Lore Heinemann
